SELECT count(*)over() total, t.* FROM ( SELECT bi.businessid id, bi.name, bi.description, 1 as type, br.categoryguid businessCategoryGuid, null technicalCategoryGuid, bi.tenantid tenantId, null tableGuid, null businessId, null businessName, bi.tenantid FROM businessinfo bi JOIN business_relation br ON br.businessid=bi.businessid WHERE 1=1 AND bi.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') ESCAPE '/'
AND ( bi.private_status='PUBLIC' OR (bi.submitter=#{userId} AND bi.submitter_read=true) OR (SELECT count(*) FROM business_2_group b2g JOIN user_group_relation ugr ON ugr.group_id = b2g.group_id AND ugr.user_id=#{userId} WHERE b2g.business_id=bi.businessid AND b2g.read=true )>0 )
AND bi.tenantid=#{tenantId} AND ( bi.private_status='PUBLIC' OR (bi.submitter=#{userId} AND bi.submitter_read=true) OR (SELECT count(*) FROM business_2_group b2g JOIN user_group_relation ugr ON ugr.group_id = b2g.group_id AND ugr.user_id=#{userId} WHERE b2g.business_id=bi.businessid AND b2g.read=true )>0 )
union SELECT ti.tableguid id, ti.tablename as name, ti.description, 2 as type, br.categoryguid businessCategoryGuid, si.category_id technicalCategoryGuid, bi.tenantid tenantId, ti.tableguid tableGuid, bi.businessid businessId, bi.name businessName, bi.tenantid FROM businessinfo bi JOIN business_relation br ON br.businessid=bi.businessid JOIN business2table b2t ON b2t.businessid=br.businessid JOIN tableinfo ti ON ti.tableguid=b2t.tableguid AND ti.status='ACTIVE' LEFT JOIN source_info si ON si.database_id=ti.databaseguid AND si.data_source_id=b2t.source_id AND si.version=0 WHERE 1=1
AND ti.tablename like concat('%',#{name},'%') ESCAPE '/'
AND ( bi.private_status='PUBLIC' OR (bi.submitter=#{userId} AND bi.submitter_read=true) OR (SELECT count(*) FROM business_2_group b2g JOIN user_group_relation ugr ON ugr.group_id = b2g.group_id AND ugr.user_id=#{userId} WHERE b2g.business_id=bi.businessid AND b2g.read=true )>0 )
AND bi.tenantid=#{tenantId} AND ( bi.private_status='PUBLIC' OR (bi.submitter=#{userId} AND bi.submitter_read=true) OR (SELECT count(*) FROM business_2_group b2g JOIN user_group_relation ugr ON ugr.group_id = b2g.group_id AND ugr.user_id=#{userId} WHERE b2g.business_id=bi.businessid AND b2g.read=true )>0 )
)t ORDER BY name limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

SELECT count(*)over() total, ti.tableguid id, ti.tablename as name, ti.description, 2 as type, br.categoryguid businessCategoryGuid, si.category_id technicalCategoryGuid, bi.tenantid tenantId tenantId, ti.tableguid tableGuid, bi.businessid businessId, bi.name businessName, bi.tenantid FROM businessinfo bi JOIN business_relation br ON br.businessid=bi.businessid JOIN business2table b2t ON b2t.businessid=br.businessid JOIN tableinfo ti ON ti.tableguid=b2t.tableguid AND ti.status='ACTIVE' LEFT JOIN source_info si ON si.database_id=ti.databaseguid AND si.data_source_id=b2t.source_id AND si.version=0 WHERE 1=1
AND ti.tablename like concat('%',#{name},'%') ESCAPE '/'
AND ( bi.private_status='PUBLIC' OR (bi.submitter=#{userId} AND bi.submitter_read=true) OR (SELECT count(*) FROM business_2_group b2g JOIN user_group_relation ugr ON ugr.group_id = b2g.group_id AND ugr.user_id=#{userId} WHERE b2g.business_id=bi.businessid AND b2g.read=true )>0 )
AND bi.tenantid=#{tenantId} AND ( bi.private_status='PUBLIC' OR (bi.submitter=#{userId} AND bi.submitter_read=true) OR (SELECT count(*) FROM business_2_group b2g JOIN user_group_relation ugr ON ugr.group_id = b2g.group_id AND ugr.user_id=#{userId} WHERE b2g.business_id=bi.businessid AND b2g.read=true )>0 )
ORDER BY name limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

SELECT bi.businessid id, bi.name, bi.description, 0 as type, br.categoryguid businessCategoryGuid, null technicalCategoryGuid, bi.tenantid tenantId, null tableGuid FROM businessinfo bi JOIN business_relation br ON br.businessid=bi.businessid WHERE bi.businessid=#{businessId}

SELECT ti.tableguid id, ti.tablename as name, ti.description, 1 as type, br.categoryguid businessCategoryGuid, si.category_id technicalCategoryGuid, #{tenantId} tenantId, ti.tableguid tableGuid FROM tableinfo ti JOIN business2table b2t ON b2t.tableguid=ti.tableguid JOIN business_relation br ON br.businessid=b2t.businessid LEFT JOIN source_info si ON si.database_id=ti.databaseguid AND si.data_source_id=b2t.source_id AND si.version=0 WHERE ti.tableguid=#{tableId} AND ti.status='ACTIVE'

select c.guid as domainId,c.name as domainName,c.tenantid as tenantId,t.name as tenantName from category c left join tenant t on c.tenantid=t.id where c.level=1 and c.categorytype=1 order by c.tenantid
select count(*) from category where parentcategoryguid=#{guid}
select guid as themeId, name as themeName from category where parentcategoryguid=#{guid}
SELECT businessid FROM business_relation where categoryguid =#{guid}

select count(*)over() total, bi.businessid,bi.name,bi.owner,bi.manager,bi.maintainer,bi.businesslastupdate, u.username as businessoperator,'0' as status,bi.tenantid from businessinfo bi join business_relation br on bi.businessid = br.businessid left join users u on bi.businessoperator=u.userid where br.categoryguid=#{categoryGuid} order by bi.businesslastupdate desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select guid,name,description,qualifiedname from category where guid = #{guid}
